title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 401.2 - Fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 401.2 - Fishing

State Regulations

No person shall fish in any waters except at such times
and such places where fishing shall be permitted, and then only in accordance
with existing State fish and game laws, rules and
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
401.2

Amended

New

York State Register May 11, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 19, eff. 5/11/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
